attributes.action: guarantee that the British people will not be permitted a referendum on the new EU reform Treaty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that a referendum on the matter of the proposed new EU Treaty is a renunciation of governmental responsibility in the exercise of its prerogatives regarding foreign affairs, is unconstitutional and contrary to British interests. We oppose a referendum in this instance and resist attempts to call one. We believe that referenda are not part of British democratic traditions and should never be employed.
